scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run electron"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.clean-cache: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules/.cache
scripts.debug: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:3011 && electron . --enable-logging"
